feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.122.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: scim improvements and ui fixes by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3304
  • Add condition to avoid secret names that contain forward slashes by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3392
  • fix: address runtime error for secret approval requests by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3393
  • feat(project-identity): get project identity by membership ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3389
  • Add secret sync vercel integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3338
  • feat: camunda app connection and secret sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3373
  • Infisical SSH - V2 by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3347
  • Add access request note and change secret request to change request by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3395
  • update vite to 5.4.18 by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3400
  • Terraform cloud integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.121.0-postgres...infisical/v0.122.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.40.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • b5b0d42dd Add writeHostCaToFile to cli for infisical ssh connect
  • 264177638 Address greptile suggestions
  • 77dd768a3 Fix merge conflicts
  • 8522420e7 Minor cleans for consistency
  • 238293738 Add configure sshd flag to infisical ssh add-host command, update issue user cert permissioning
  • bf5e8d8c8 Add ssh host command to cli
  • 99aa567a6 Add ssh host endpoint for issuing ssh host cert
  • eb4816fd2 Add infisical ssh connect command

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.123.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added caching for secret dal by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3394
  • Add go-sdk version parameter to RetrieveSecretOptions docs by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3401
  • feat(kms): sign & verify data by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3357
  • Github & Gitlab SSO display name fallback to username by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3412
  • fix: improve kms key migration by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3416
  • misc: add proper display of auth failure message for OIDC by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3414

New Contributors

  • @x032205 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3412

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.122.0-postgres...infisical/v0.123.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.123.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvement: Native Integration Deprecation Details and Sync Redirect by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3404
  • Add warning on secret deletions where it's being imported by another folder by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3356
  • Improvement: Rollback Secret V1 Create Deprecation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3417
  • Avoid throwing on getFolderIsImportedBy no folder found by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3423
  • Feature: Add General Env Var for Allowing Internal IP Connections by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3418

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.123.0-postgres...infisical/v0.123.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.123.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase Certificate Alternative Names (SAN) Character Limit to 4096 by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3421
  • feat: add metadata based permissions for dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3391
  • Fixed v1/folders API backward compatibility with directory parameter by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3428
  • feat: dashboard failing on failing check by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3433
  • Improve random value generator modal UI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3434
  • Feature: Auth0 Connection and Client Secret Rotation by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3397
  • misc: made jwt signature alg configurable for oidc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.123.1-postgres...infisical/v0.123.2-postgres
